title: Backports for 1.12.4
body:
Backported PRs:
- [x] #60279 <!-- Correct version in which at-lock was exported -->
- [x] #60299 <!-- Fix buffer overflow in jloptions -->
- [x] #60291 <!-- build: include `SuiteSparse` in pkgimages to precompile -->
- [x] #60330 <!-- Logging: define isless between Integer and LogLevel -->
- [x] #60383 <!-- use a "locally frozen world age" to invoke `_artifact_str` in -->
- [x] #60414 

Need manual backport:
- [x] #60041 <!-- MozillaCACerts: Update to 2025-11-04 -->
- [x] #60195 <!-- Fix `remove-argument-side-effects` with keyword call -->
- [x] #60215 <!-- Bump Documenter to 1.16.1 -->
- [ ] #60246 <!-- Don't introduce a block around `y` in parsing `x' = y` -->
- [x] #60308 <!-- Make stdlib precompile failures throw -->
- [ ] #60403 <!-- JuliaSyntax:force specialize on function in `parse_brackets` -->

Contains multiple commits, manual intervention needed:
- [ ] #60376 <!-- Add heap sized based full gc heuristic -->

Non-merged PRs with backport label:
- [ ] #60121 <!-- avoid overflow when `inline_cost_threshold == typemax(Int)` -->
- [ ] #60113 <!-- some IR deserialization backwards compatibility fixes -->
- [ ] #60062 <!-- trimming: fix-up support for `Core._apply_iterate` -->
- [ ] #59914 <!-- codegen: use direct value PHI for pointer-free aggregate types -->
- [ ] #59450 <!-- Propagate Addrspaces: fix lift of memset -->
- [ ] #58359 <!-- Use dwarf for symbol lookup if dladdr fails before doing linear search. -->
- [ ] #57422 <!-- Fix performance regression in hvcat of simple matrices -->
- [ ] #55601 <!-- inference: track reaching defs for slots -->
